docs.text: [toc] run docker on win10 ¶ install docker install git install vscode for terminal (+powershell) mount volume permission error; need to do 'docker run' on powershell ¶ C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe: Error response from daemon: mkdir C:\Program Files\Git\var: Access is denied. See 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe run --help'. portainer ¶ docker run -d \ -p 9000:9000 \ -p 8000:8000 \ --name portainer \ --restart always \ -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \ -v /d/docker/portainer:/data \ portainer/portainer centos ¶ docker run -d \ --restart always \ --name=centos \ centos:7 sleep infinity
